nextButton.label: Next tip
nextButton.hint: Tap to see the next tip

skipButton.label: Skip all tips
skipButton.hint: Tap to skip all remaining tips

capture.title: Quick Capture
capture.description: Tap the microphone to record voice notes or the plus button to create text notes

search.title: Smart Search
search.description: Use the search bar to find your thoughtmarks by keywords or meaning

bins.title: Organize with Bins
bins.description: Create bins to organize your thoughtmarks by topic or project

ai.title: AI Insights
ai.description: Get smart suggestions and connections between your ideas

voice.title: Voice Commands
voice.description: Use Siri shortcuts to capture thoughts hands-free
